text: Nɨbi binɨb okok kɨlop kanɨb adek ak yom tep gɨnɨgun apɨm ak pen, bɨ wɨdɨn koy mɨdebɨm agak. Nɨbi tɨtay dɨnɨgabɨm agak. Binɨb okok kɨlop takaw agñɨbɨm agak. Pen anɨb apɨm, Bɨ olap ñɨn dad aplanɨl God agnɨgep kal awl ak yomɨl agɨnɨgab, Yepɨs ma apin, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agɨnɨgab ak, takaw anɨb ak takaw yokɨp, kɨdek agup tek ma gɨnɨmuŋ tek lup apɨm agak. Pen bɨ olap ñɨn dad aplanɨl, tap gol okok God agnɨgep kal awl mɨgan mɨdeb ak yomɨl agɨnɨgab, Yepɨs ma apin, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agɨnɨgab ak, kɨdek agup tek nep gɨnɨmuŋ apɨm agak.
